sub_topic: Calculating the circumference of a circle.
message_1: A wheel has a radius of 7 cm. What is the circumference of the wheel?
message_2:
The circumference of a circle (or wheel) can be calculated using the formula C = 2πr, where C is the circumference, and r is the radius.

Given that the radius of the wheel is 7 cm, we can plug this value into the formula:

C = 2π(7 cm)
C ≈ 2 × 3.14159 × 7 cm
C ≈ 43.9823 cm

The circumference of the wheel is approximately 43.98 cm.
